get.summary: Returns all Reminders for specified customer.
get.description: Returns all Reminders for specified customer.

get.summary: Returns a reminder for a specified customer and reminder type
get.description: Returns a reminder for a specified customer and reminder type

put.description:
Sample Request:

    PUT
    {
        "customerId": 25421,
        "reminderType": DeadlineSMS,
        "period": 1,
        "time": 2
    }
    
ReminderPeriods: 1 = Never, 2 = On Deadline Day, 3 = Day Before Deadline, 4 = Two Days Before Deadline
ReminderTimes: 1 = 7am, 2 = 12pm, 3 = 3pm (inactive), 4 = 5pm, 5 = 10pm

404.description: Item matching this Id could not be found.
